name: GatorLeads
author: GatorLeads

sections.description:
GatorLeads is a powerful ‘IP Look Up’ Solution that will unmask the company names of your website visitors. GatorLeads is an essential B2B lead generation tool that greatly enhances your online marketing ROI.

GatorLeads will give your business detailed activity reports concerning keywords, referring sites and much more. GatorLeads can integrate with your CRM system, automatically lead score visitors on their activities and send notifications and reports to specific sales, marketing individuals or whoever you choose based on any number of visitor variables you’ve selected .

GatorLeads pulls further information from Linkedin.com and other business data services providing you with a detailed overview of your website visitors, including employee name and position for that specific company or organisation.

GatorLeads will give your business an untold number of new sales opportunities and insight into who is visiting your website, allowing you to get more from your online investments, and ensure that you never lose another online prospect again.

https://www.gatorleads.co.uk/
sections.installation:
1. Upload GatorLeads to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the GatorLeads panel under the ‘Settings’ menu and add your Client Id and set the settings you want.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

Updated Cookiebot consent to correctly disable cookie tracking if enabled and contact tracking is enabled.

1.0.5

Updated Cookiebot consent support to handle if the Cookiebot consent is not intialised.

1.0.4

Tested on WordPress 5.8.1. Added CookieBot consent option.

1.0.3

Tested on WordPress 5.4.1. Romoved logged in user tracking. That feature is now obsolete.

1.0.2

Tested on WordPress 5.1.1. Added support for GatorPopup

1.0.1

Update to accommodate the mode from the WOW Analytics Tracking plugin

1.0

First release version.

short_description: Embeds the GatorLeads tracking code into your Wordpress website without having to edit your templates.

screenshots.caption: Hover over the Setting menu on the left and you should see “GatorLeads” click on this menu item
From the Admin menu at the top of GatorLeads select “Embed Tracking” option under “Client Admin” , copy your client id
In Wordpress and enter the Client Id in the relevant section of the GatorLeads Settings
